plot: Two vigilantes attempt to track down a dangerous young woman named Sorinne. When their plan goes horribly wrong, they begin to turn on each other, each believing they are doing what is necessary to save an innocent life.
title: Sorinne
plot_es: Two vigilantes attempt to track down a dangerous young woman named Sorinne. When their plan goes horribly wrong, they begin to turn on each other, each believing they are doing what is necessary to save an innocent life.
plot_en: Two vigilantes attempt to track down a dangerous young woman named Sorinne. When their plan goes horribly wrong, they begin to turn on each other, each believing they are doing what is necessary to save an innocent life.
